definition: a sharp slanting blow, to terminate or abbreviate before its intended or proper end or its full extent
details:
noun
- a sharp slanting blow
= example: a sharp slanting blow
- the act of clipping or snipping
= synonyms: clipping, snip
- a metal frame or container holding cartridges
= synonyms: cartridge holder, cartridge clip, magazine
- any of various small fasteners used to hold loose articles together
- an article of jewelry that can be clipped onto a hat or dress
- an instance or single occasion for some event
= synonyms: time
verb
- to terminate or abbreviate before its intended or proper end or its full extent
= synonyms: curtail, cut short
- to cultivate, tend, and cut back the growth of
= example: to cultivate, tend, and cut back the growth of
= synonyms: trim, dress, snip, crop, prune, cut back, lop
- to attach with a clip
= example: to attach with a clip
- to sever or remove by pinching or snipping
= example: to sever or remove by pinching or snipping
= synonyms: snip, nip, nip off, snip off
- to run at a moderately swift pace
= synonyms: jog
